Introduction
This topic contains information on reductions in disability evaluations, including
initial notification of the proposed adverse action
action to take
if a Veteran expresses disagreement before VA makes a final decision
, and
after a Veteran responds or fails to respond to a notice of proposed adverse action
withdrawing a proposal to reduce a disability evaluation under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
action to take on final rating decisions prepared under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
providing notification of a final rating decision
handling evidence received after preparation of a final rating decision but prior to the effective date of reduction
, and
military retired pay (MRP) adjustment following a reduction in disability compensation
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B - Authorization for Reductions in Disability Evaluations Under 38 CFR 3.105(e)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 4, Section B
